conbody.p: This section introduces and how it manages the agents providing Industrial-Grade Next-Generation Antivirus and Application Lockdown protection to your assets. An overview of management functions is provided. This manual will focus on its use for OFFICIAL_PRODUCT_NAME: an OT/ICS-compatible, high performance and zero touch endpoint protection solution, and PRODUCT_SHORT_NAME: a simple, no-maintenance solution to lock down and protect fixed-function computers, helping protect businesses against security threats and increase productivity.
